header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 195-50r15 drivers
Check out the sale price on this tire
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 195/50R15 Tire Size 
The 195/50R15 tire size is one you’ll find on select models of the Mazda Miata, Volkswagen Golf and Jetta, Ford Escort, Ford Fiesta and others. If you’ve got a car or truck that’s rolling on 195/50R15 tires, chances are you’re looking for an all-season or touring tire that can deliver good road manners and handling, year-round traction, long wear and a quiet, comfortable ride. If you’re looking for a new set of 195/50R15 tires, take a look at the Falken Ziex ZE960 A/S, [Hankook Ventus V2 Concept2 (H457)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/ventus-v2-concept2-h457), and Primewell Valera Sport A/S.

Maybe you’re looking for something a bit sportier for your ride. Consider the Yokohama Advan Fleva V701, Kumho Ecsta PA31, and [GT Radial Champiro SX2](https://simpletire.com/brands/gt-radial-tires/champiro-sx2) as each tire offers sporty traction and performance; just be sure to replace any of these with all-season or winter tires once temperatures are consistently below 45 degrees Fahrenheit.

Whether you need an all-season, performance, or another type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 195/50R15 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
